question:
Which among the following recommendations about the Gokhale's Political Testaments is/ are correct?
1. Reducing the control of Government of India and granting Provincial autonomy
2. Three of the total six members of the Executive Council of the Governor should have to be Indians
3. Provincial Legislative Council would control the Provincial Government
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Gokhale\'s Political Testaments was published in the year 1917. As per his recommendation, three of the total six members of the Executive Council of the Governor should have to be Indians. Provincial Legislative Council would control the Provincial Government. His recommendations mainly aimed at reduction of the control of the Government of India and granting Provincial autonomy.
